name: Blinky Eye
description:
Blinky Eye is a “Flappy Bird” type game with unique graphical and thematic interpretations.
Instructions:
Press Left-Mouse button or Spacebar to blink.

Avoid the rotting flesh and bone to get the highest score you can manage.

Check out Blinky Eye on Kongregate, as well!:
http://www.kongregate.com/games/TheMawbster/blinky...
